actions.text: Wow this place is even worse than the sports hall.
This place so dead, I thought there would at least be some old gym stuff left in here.
Why would they leave perfectly fine equipment just to rot it wouldn't make any sense.
Steel dumbbells don't care about rot or bacteria, they are there for you to lift them. No matter the place or the time üòéüèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Yeah so why would they leave it in the sports hall that's off premises for students?
Oh I know! The bugs could lift them! They could get swole and then challenge the human race!!
Hey there, what brings you here?
Oh hi oversized ant! Didn't see you there.
Yo! Lucy told me to help out so I decided to see how you guys were doing.
We're doing fine. I'm a bit sad that there are less bugs than I expected. But we waddle.
It doesn't look like there is anything that could help us with our search üîé here.
Honestly this place is kind of spooky, I would rather not hand around here for too long.
I'll go around and check all the corners and walls of the room just to make sure. You two can wait here.
Sure, thanks Chad!
Hey Gryphon, do you mind if I ask you a personal question?
Sure AntMan fire away!
What do you think of Lucy?
I think she is a very lovely lady! Even though she's human and not an arachnid, she can still send my spider senses tingling.
I see...
So what's your relationship like with Lucy?
Isn't it obvious? They are head over heels for each other. You should be able to tell that just by looking at them bro.
I'm not head over heels for anybody!! All I'm interested in is my bug collection and.. and...
I see, so its complicated
They'll understand eventually. Nothing for us to do here. You shouldn't pry any deeper or you might make Gryphon really angry, and even' I'm scared of that ü•∂.
Hey what are you two blabbering your mouths about?!!?! Spit it out and tell me straight or else.
Gryphon pulls out his box of centipedes very threateningly. I understand and begin to slowly back away.
Sorry Gryphon, I'll leave you alone.
It's all right haha I was just playing around.
It is said that every joke has an ounce of truth in it.
Ahaha maybe so. *stare*
Alright since there is nothing else here I suppose we should reconvene in the sports hall.
Factual information my G, let us commence forth.
That seems to have gone well. I feel like I got a bit closer to Chad and Gryphon.
I don't want to stay in this room alone. I should get going.
